alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 10:49PM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Through Monday, accumulations of 1 to 2 feet expected with locally higher amounts possible in the Provo area mountains and Ben Lomond area. From Monday night through Wednesday afternoon, another 1 to 2 feet expected, with locally higher amounts in the Upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Wednesday afternoon. Most likely periods of heaviest snowfall are Sunday night, Tuesday morning and Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
